title: PaymentInitiationAddress
description: The optional address of the payment recipient's bank account. Required by most institutions outside of the UK.

street.description: An array of length 1-2 representing the street address where the recipient is located. Maximum of 70 characters.

city.description: The city where the recipient is located. Maximum of 35 characters.

postal_code.description: The postal code where the recipient is located. Maximum of 16 characters.

country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code where the recipient is located.
